愧不敢當.definition: lit. I'm ashamed and dare not (accept the honor); fig. I do not deserve your praise.; You flatter me too much.

愧對.definition: to be ashamed to face (sb); to feel bad about having failed (sb)

愧恨.definition: ashamed and sorry; suffering shame and remorse

愧悔無地.definition: ashamed and unable to show one's face (idiom)

愧疚.definition: to feel guilty; to feel ashamed of oneself; to be remorseful
